description: This operation returns the metadata and details specific to the backup index associated with the specified recovery point.

parameters.name: BackupVaultName
parameters.description: The name of a logical container where backups are stored. Backup vaults are identified by names that are unique to the account used to create them and the Region where they are created. Accepted characters include lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens.

parameters.name: RecoveryPointArn
parameters.description: An ARN that uniquely identifies a recovery point; for example, arn:aws:backup:us-east-1:123456789012:recovery-point:1EB3B5E7-9EB0-435A-A80B-108B488B0D45.

nested_items.name: RecoveryPointArn
nested_items.description: An ARN that uniquely identifies a recovery point; for example, arn:aws:backup:us-east-1:123456789012:recovery-point:1EB3B5E7-9EB0-435A-A80B-108B488B0D45.

nested_items.name: BackupVaultArn
nested_items.description: An ARN that uniquely identifies the backup vault where the recovery point index is stored.

nested_items.name: SourceResourceArn
nested_items.description: A string of the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies the source resource.

nested_items.name: IndexCreationDate
nested_items.description: The date and time that a backup index was created, in Unix format and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). The value of CreationDate is accurate to milliseconds. For example, the value 1516925490.087 represents Friday, January 26, 2018 12:11:30.087 AM.

nested_items.name: IndexDeletionDate
nested_items.description: The date and time that a backup index was deleted, in Unix format and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). The value of CreationDate is accurate to milliseconds. For example, the value 1516925490.087 represents Friday, January 26, 2018 12:11:30.087 AM.

nested_items.name: IndexCompletionDate
nested_items.description: The date and time that a backup index finished creation, in Unix format and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). The value of CreationDate is accurate to milliseconds. For example, the value 1516925490.087 represents Friday, January 26, 2018 12:11:30.087 AM.

nested_items.name: IndexStatus
nested_items.description: This is the current status for the backup index associated with the specified recovery point.

nested_items.name: IndexStatusMessage
nested_items.description: A detailed message explaining the status of a backup index associated with the recovery point.

nested_items.name: TotalItemsIndexed
nested_items.description: Count of items within the backup index associated with the recovery point.
